function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 by pre-symptomatic and asymptomatic carriers through speech droplets and aerosols.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to undetected carriers transmitting the virus during speech.","Mitigation":"Use of face masks to reduce the emission of speech droplets and aerosols, especially in indoor environments.","Technologies":"High-filtration masks, ventilation systems, air purifiers.","People":"General public, individuals in close proximity to carriers.","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, individuals."},{"Description":"Production of a wide range of droplet sizes during conversational speech.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of airborne transmission of droplets during speech, leading to potential exposure to infectious particles.","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems, social distancing, and use of face masks to reduce inhalation of speech droplets.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, high-filtration masks, social distancing technologies.","People":"General public, individuals in close proximity to speakers.","Owner":"Building management, health organizations, government authorities."},{"Description":"High concentrations of SARS-CoV-2 virus in oral fluids and upper respiratory tract symptoms at the early stage of infection.","Impact":"Risk of transmitting the virus through respiratory secretions, leading to potential exposure and infection.","Mitigation":"Early identification of symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals, implementation of testing and contact tracing, and adherence to quarantine protocols.","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, contact tracing apps, quarantine monitoring technologies.","People":"General public, individuals in close contact with infected individuals.","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, individuals."}]}
